FuncDef:
The vsi command configures the name of a VSI for the NQA VPLS PW ping test instance.
The undo vsi command deletes the name of the VSI of the NQA VPLS PW ping test instance.
By default, the name of a VSI is not specified.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the name of a VSI for the NQA test instance, run the vsi command.
Precautions
A test instance can be successfully executed only when the specified VSI exists and in the Up state before you start the test instance. If the specified VSI does not exist or is not in the Up state, the test instance fails to be executed.
